summary: This is a calendar entry showing the cancellation of a weekly meeting for the CID (Criminal Investigative Division) UC (likely Undercover or Unit Chief) at the FBI. It indicates regular coordination was occurring within the FBI's investigative division related to the Epstein case in 2019.

events.title: Cancellation of CID UC Weekly Meeting
events.description: A regularly scheduled weekly meeting for the FBI's Criminal Investigative Division (CID) UC (likely Undercover or Unit Chief) team was canceled.

events.title: Establishment of CID UC Weekly Meeting
events.description: The weekly meeting for the FBI's Criminal Investigative Division UC team was established to occur every Wednesday at 2:00 p.m.

keyFacts: The FBI's Criminal Investigative Division (CID) held a weekly UC (likely Undercover or Unit Chief) meeting every Wednesday at 2:00 p.m.
This specific meeting scheduled for May 1, 2019, was canceled.
The meeting series was established effective December 5, 2018, indicating ongoing investigative coordination.
The calendar entry was created and modified on April 26, 2019, by an organizer from CID/FBI.
The entry shows structured internal FBI coordination related to the investigation around the time of Epstein's 2019 arrest.
